nodes.text: Star Wars Battle Games 3 is a magazine published by De Agostini in 2004. It featured a game and a miniature piece of Rebel trooper. It also included part of the cutout to make the Tantive IV.

Relive the greatest battles of the Star Wars saga in this compelling turn-based action game. With each issue, take command of a new battle, and a new hand-painted Star Wars miniature PLUS temporary card figurines so that you can play full-scale battles right away.
